item.title: Andrew Lincoln, David Ireland on ITV’s ‘Coldwater,’ About “a Normal Man in a Far From Normal Situation”
item.description: “He tickles you as he’s pushing you off a cliff,” the star says about the writer. “To try and sustain a man in free fall for that amount of time was quite exciting for my masochistic kind of sensibili
